ai-patthana15.76:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.76:1.1_0: Existence regarding the rapture and bliss that give rise to rapture.
ai-patthana15.76:2.1_0: accompanied by rapture is a condition for the rapture and bliss born of rapture. ...
ai-patthana15.76:4.1_0: Sexual happiness arises dependent on the teaching and is not a condition for happiness.
ai-patthana15.76:5.1_0: Pleasure and pain arise in the same way.
ai-patthana15.76:7.1_1: for the sake of the four reasons ...
